aircraft.value: Phantom Stealth - AC-4515-393 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Flight control cable fraying detected. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 18/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 20/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 22/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 24/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 25/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
